document_data.name: ''Sword of Chaos''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Sword of Chaos''''' was the personal weapon of the [[Bhaalspawn]] [[Deathbringer]], [[Sarevok Anchev]].
document_data.Description: It was believed the sword was crafted specifically for Sarevok.
document_data.Powers: The ''Sword of Chaos'' drained the life force of any foe it struck and conferred its wielder.
document_data.History:
Sarevok wielded this sword in his fateful battle with his half-sibling in the [[Temple of Bhaal (Undercity)|Bhaalist temple]] beneath [[Baldur's Gate]].

After Sarevok's death the ''Sword of Chaos'' was stored within the city's [[High Hall]].

By the [[1369 DR|following year]], the sword came into the possession of [[Malaaq]] the [[genie]] enslaved by [[archmage]] [[Jon Irenicus]] who was willing to exchange the sword for his freedom when dealing with [[Abdel Adrian]].

At some point over the next century Sarevok was reunited with his favored blade. It remained in his possession as of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}.
